tooltip.testmod.grobbler: Gives you the contents of your enderchest
tooltip.testmod.tombler: Do not click them, they despise you
tooltip.testmod.speed_block.tooltip: Block that increases speed and jump height when stood on.
tooltip.testmod.mace_item.tooltip: Powerful weapon that does more damage the longer you have fallen
tooltip.testmod.telport_staff.tooltip: Teleports player to nearby block, simply right click any block within range.
